btv.bencoding

Class BDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.bencoding.BDecoder

  • public class BDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will decode bencoded information.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object decode(java.lang.String data)
      Decodes a bencoded String and returns either a String, Integer, List of Map

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public static java.lang.Object decode(java.lang.String data)
                               throws BDecodingException
        Decodes a bencoded String and returns either a String, Integer, List of Map
        Parameters:
        data - The bencoded information to decode.
        Returns:
        The decoded data in the form of a String, Integer, List or Map
        Throws:
        BDecodingException - If the end of the data is reached when not expected or if an unexpected characted is encountered.
